## ScrollAdaptorEvent interface

Payload signature for a scroll event. Includes true and dampened values, incase real time values are needed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScrollAdaptorEvent extends ContinuousEvent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ContinuousEvent](./controls.continuousevent.md)
